author: newsr.in
title: Gambhir-Tiwary Ranji fight: Gautam Gambhir match fees docked by 50%
text: Tiwary first took guard and was about to take strike. But he stopped the bowler and signalled at the dressing room to bring his helmet as a pacer was operating from the other end. The furore started with Gambhir saying: "Shaam ko mil tujhe maroonga (Meet me in the evening, I will hit you). And Tiwary retorted, saying: "Shaam kya ... Â»
